casebody.data:
LATIMORE, Respondent, v. LEDERMAN et al., Appellants. (Supreme Court General Term, Fourth Department. May 18, 1894.) Action by Moses Latimore against Moses Lederman and another.

Argued before HARDIN, P. J„ and MARTIN and MERWIN, JJ.

No opinion. Judgment and order reversed on the facts, and a new trial granted, without costs of the appeal to either party, upon the payment of costs of former trial within 20 days. If such costs are not so paid, judgment and order affirmed, with costs of the appeal to the respondent.
